nodes.text: Quin Amarant was a male Lamproid who was a member of Lourna Dee's Tempest of the Nihil. Exiled from his homeworld Florn after he murdered his home nest, Amarant fought alongside Dee during the Nihil's attack on Valo, but was captured by Jedi archivist OrbaLin. Amarant was subsequently allowed to escape Valo in order for the Jedi to locate the Nihil base on Grizal, where he was killed by Dee during the subsequent battle for failing to check his stolen starship for homing beacons.
